landing.heroDescription: Perfect for couples, families, and partners. Track shared expenses, manage budgets together, and keep your financial goals in sync.

features.title: Built for Partnership
features.description: Every feature designed to make shared financial management effortless and transparent.

twoPersonFocus.title: Two-Person Focus
twoPersonFocus.description: Designed specifically for couples, partners, and close collaborators. No complex group management, just simple two-person expense tracking.

realTimeSync.title: Real-time Sync
realTimeSync.description: Every transaction syncs instantly. Both partners always see the latest balance and expenses without any delays or conflicts.

securePrivate.title: Secure & Private
securePrivate.description: Your financial data is encrypted and secure. Only you and your partner have access to your shared budget information.

cta.title: Ready to Budget Together?
cta.description: Join thousands of couples who've simplified their shared expenses with PairBudget.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using PairBudget, you agree to these terms.
terms.acceptableUseBody: You must use the service lawfully and must not attempt to abuse or disrupt it.
terms.dataRetentionBody: Account and pocket data is retained until deleted by users or cleanup workflows. Audit logs may be retained for security investigations.
terms.liabilityBody: PairBudget is provided as-is without warranties. We are not liable for indirect or consequential losses.
terms.contactBody: For legal requests, contact support through your project channels.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains how PairBudget handles personal data.
privacy.dataCollectedBody: We store account profile data, pocket membership, transactions, and technical diagnostics required to operate the app.
privacy.firebaseBody: Authentication, Firestore, and Storage are powered by Firebase. Data is processed under Firebase terms and security controls.
privacy.cookiesBody: The app uses local storage/session data for auth state, preferences, and application stability.
privacy.rightsBody: You can request export of your data and delete your account data from within the app settings.
